# 入力
a, b = map(int, input().split())

# 計算
add = a + b
sub = a - b
mul = a * b

# 出力
print(max(add, sub, mul))

A, B = map(int, input().split())

print(max(A+B, A-B, A*B))

A, B = map(int, input().split())

print(max(A + B, A - B, A * B))

#%%
a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(max(a + b, a - b, a * b))

A, B = map(int, input().split())

print(max([A + B, A - B, A * B]))

a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(max(a + b, a - b, a * b))
